name: Confessional of Sin (Erorink)
description:
Intro

In game

This game is the production of a game jam with the theme of 'audio'. We are tring to make audio as an indispensable element. Also considered as a potential game for English language listening test!?  XD

Team member(alphabet order):  Even, Heino, Joon, Link, Mike

Narrative writter: Even, Heino, Joon

Programer: Link, Joon, Mike, Heino

Musician: Mike

During the development, we have some trouble in communication, and the work pipeline did not work well, thankfully we managed to overcome it. Thanks for everyone's great works!
